BladderCommand¶

robot.commands.bladder.BladderCommand.BladderCommand

class BladderCommand[source]¶

Bases: CommandInterface

__init__ Create a Bladder Command object. Takes in commands and performs the appropriate actions.

Methods

deflate

deflate Deflate the robots bladder

execute

This method will be called to execute the functionality implemented in a command.

inflate

inflate Inflate the robot's bladder

move_all

move_all Move all bladder motors at a specified speed.

move_all_dist

move_all Move all bladder motors a distance in a specified direction

stop

stop Stop all of the motors.
deflate()[source]¶

deflate Deflate the robots bladder

execute(responseStatusCallback, jsonObject)[source]¶

This method will be called to execute the functionality implemented in a command.

Parameters:

  • responseStatusCallback (function) – A callback function has to be passed, that will send status of command execution. This callback will be passed by the caller of execute().

  • jsonObject (json object) – A JSON object containing relevant data for a command.

Raises:

NotImplementedError – abstract class

inflate()[source]¶

inflate Inflate the robot’s bladder

move_all(direction, speed)[source]¶

move_all Move all bladder motors at a specified speed.

Parameters:

  • direction (_type_) – Direction to move motors

  • speed (int) – Speed to move at.

move_all_dist(dist1, dist2, dist3, direction, speed)[source]¶

move_all Move all bladder motors a distance in a specified direction

Parameters:

  • direction (_type_) – Direction to move motors

  • dist1 (int) – Distance to move motor 1

  • dist2 (int) – Distance to move motor 2

  • dist2 – Distance to move motor 3

stop()[source]¶

stop Stop all of the motors.
